sentences: Lapsed suudavad palju õppida, kui neil on hea õpetaja.
Ma ei suuda aru saada, miks sa nii käitud.
context: The Estonian word 'suud' expresses ability or capability. It is often used with the verb 'ma', forming 'ma suudan' which means 'I can'. It indicates that someone has the capacity to do something, similar to 'be able to' in English.
